EmailTemplate.name: Touch base with Turbonomic (1495119432.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Touch base with Turbonomic (1495119432.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - 98 Clean false false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Marie,I feel short emails are most effective so I will keep it quick for you. I noticed our team has reached out to your organization in the past, however they appeared to be very brief and high level conversations. What we do:Assure application performance while cutting costs associated with managing the virtual environment. We allow companies to deliver reliable IT services at the lowest possible cost. How we do it: <[[http://t.signaleuna.com/e1t/c/5/f18dQhb0S7lC8dDMPbW2n0x6l2B9nMJN7t5XYgdntBMW2BV-YF1px66vW4Y95BM56dQXwf1T-dyl02?t=http%3a%2f%2fyoutu.be%2fdd2VDWiUSUc&si=6024827084210176&pi=6da24dfc1ecf421aa270ba6859672163]]> Results:· -increase vm density (25-50%) ex. Fareportal <[[http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/04/VMTurbo-Fareportal-Success-Story1.pdf]]>· -reduce future server spend (30-40%) ex. BT Global <[[http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/VMTurbo-BT-Success-Story.pdf]]>· -reduce performance related incidents and alerts ex. Boston College <[[http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/BostonCollegeSuccessStory.pdf]]>· -reduce time spent manually troubleshooting and planning ex. Colgate - Palmolive <[[http://cdn.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/VMTurbo-Colgate-Palmolive-Success-Story.pdf]]> Do you have 5 minutes at some point this week to see if Turbonomic might align with your initiatives for 2017? Katie NorchiSales Development RepresentativeO: 857.305.4618 C: 440.708.8477500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116
